transcript: I have done everything, everyone in this entire place has told me to do I've been here for over an hour, they made me wait in line every single time I start over again.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I have done everything everyone in this entire place has told me to do.  I've been here for over an hour.  They make me wait in line.  Every single time I start over again.
